After bringing Kaun Banega Crorepati back on the small screen with megastar Amitabh Bachchan last year, the channel in question launched the fourth season of the dance reality show Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 4 with dancing diva Madhuri Dixit .

Fox News Watch Saturday 2:30 p et Indiana Congressman Mike Pence will not run for president in 2012. In a letter to supporters he writes; In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012. Mike Pence has been laying the groundwork to seek Indiana's GOP gubernatorial nomination to succeed Republican White House run and working out details with his wife and family.
